title: Citi and the March of Dimes: Employee Testimonial
summary: Citi and the March of Dimes have worked together for the past dozen years by donating funds to improve the health of babies. Our employees and their families have been eager to participate in our fundraising efforts - especially when the cause hits close to home. Read a story from Citi employees, Sierra and Bob Clemments, below:
